prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey, just checking in! How was your weekend?  
Reminder: Your dentist appointment is tomorrow at 3 PM.  
Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive on Thursday.  
Thanks for your help with the project! Can we meet tomorrow to discuss?  
Your bank statement for October is now available online.  
Hey! Are we still on for dinner tonight? Let me know what time works for you.  
Just a heads up, the community meeting is this Thursday at 7 PM.  
Your one-time password is 123456. Please enter it to proceed.  
Looking forward to our coffee catch-up next week!  
I’ve sent the revised report. Please review it before our meeting.  
Your subscription will renew on the 15th. Thank you for being with us!  
Can you remind me to pick up the dry cleaning tomorrow?  
Hey, I saw that new café opened up. Want to check it out this weekend?  
Your order has been confirmed! Thank you for shopping with us.  
I’ll be late to the meeting, running into traffic.  
Just wanted to say I appreciate everything you do!  
Your flight is delayed by 2 hours. Please check the airline’s website for updates.  
Could you please send me the presentation slides when you get a chance?  
I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
The concert tickets have been sent to your email. Enjoy!  
Quick reminder: The deadline for submissions is next Friday.  
I’m thinking of hosting a game night this month. Interested?  
Your appointment has been successfully booked for next Tuesday at 10 AM.  
Thanks for picking up the groceries! You’re a lifesaver.  
Please confirm your attendance for the workshop by the end of the day.  
Hey, just wanted to remind you about the birthday party this Saturday!  
Your electricity bill is due on the 5th.  
I’ve attached the documents you requested. Let me know if you need anything else.  
How did your presentation go? I’m sure you nailed it!  
The car service is scheduled for Thursday at 2 PM.  
Thanks for the update! I’ll review the changes and get back to you.  
I’m really excited about the trip next month!  
Your feedback is important to us. Please fill out this short survey.  
Please let me know if you can help with the event this weekend.  
I just made a reservation for us at the new Italian restaurant!  
Your package has been delivered to your doorstep.  
Can we reschedule our meeting for next week? Something came up.  
Hope you’re having a good day! Just wanted to say hi.  
Your health check-up is due. Please book an appointment when you can.  
Thanks for the reminder about the school meeting. I’ll be there!  
I’m sorry to hear you’re feeling unwell. Take care!  
Your feedback on the recent changes is much appreciated.  
Can’t wait to see you at the wedding next month!  
Your subscription expires soon. Would you like to renew?  
I’m running a bit late, but I’ll be there in 10 minutes.  
Please confirm if you received the payment for the invoice.  
Excited to catch up at the reunion next week!  
Don’t forget our movie night this Friday!  
Your account has been successfully updated.  
Thanks for sharing the article! I found it really interesting.  
Let me know if you’re free for a quick chat later!  
Just a reminder, the webinar starts at 2 PM tomorrow.  
Your feedback has been submitted successfully. Thank you!
